summary: Dovahkiin Bunker - Adds a medium sized lore friendly black dwemer themed player home to the outskirts of Riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][SIZE=7][COLOR=#ffc000][FONT=Impact]Dovahkiin Bunker[/FONT][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Book Antiqua]Adds a medium sized lore friendly black dwemer themed player home to the outskirts of Riverwood. Access is available after you purchase the Dovahkiin Bunker Lexicon Cube from Lucan Valerius at the Riverwood trader. Two extra Lexicon cubes are also available which will unlock your new custom weapons and armor after entering the property. New Spells and gold smithing options are also available but only in the dovahkiin bunker. The bunker contains all essentials, mannequins, Weapon Racks Plaques, Lots Of Varied Storage, A Full Crafting Area, Enchanters Table, Alchemist's Table, Staff Enchanter, Cooking Area, Library, Bedroom, Throne, Harvestable Plants. The bunker is fully follower friendly and all containers are safe to store items. Compatible with Ebonvale, Towns And Villages Enhanced-Riverwood.[/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Book Antiqua]
[/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffc000][FONT=Impact]CHEATS TIPS AND TRICKS.[/FONT][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Book Antiqua]
[/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Book Antiqua]coc Riverwooddovahkiinbunker[/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Book Antiqua]
[/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Book Antiqua]Test chests can be found inside the 2 Columns that support the bunker[/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Book Antiqua]
[/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Book Antiqua]After Using the Lexicon Cubes you can sell them back to the vendor you bought them from to make back some of your gold....Or You can pickpocket them for free.[/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Book Antiqua]
[/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Book Antiqua]The Riverwood Trader now sells more items and has more gold to spend[/FONT][/CENTER]
author: TRUEDRAGONBORN
